snippet: BEGUN--Martin S. The Jewish Community Relations Council of New York mourns the passing of our beloved esteemed Past President, Martin S. Begun. Martin was an exceptionally compassionate leader, counselor and friend. His wise guidance and vivacious personality will be sorely missed. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Ronald G. Weiner, President Charles S. Temel, President-Elect Michael S. Miller, Exec. VP and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin S. The Jewish Community Relations Council of New York mourns the passing of our beloved esteemed Past President, Martin S. Begun. Martin was an exceptionally compassionate leader, counselor and friend. His wise guidance and vivacious personality will be sorely missed. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Ronald G. Weiner, President Charles S. Temel, President-Elect Michael S. Miller, Exec. VP and CEO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEGUN, MARTIN S
